dcterms:creator: Yingshan Chang
Mridu Narang
Hisami Suzuki
Guihong Cao

Yonatan Bisk
dcterms:description: This dataset contains multi-hop, multimodal question-answer pairs, where each query requires 1-2 images or 1-2 text snippets to answer. The answers are in free-form sentences.
dcterms:title: WebQA

dcterms:creator: Alon Talmor
Ori Yoran
Amnon Catav
Dan Lahav
Yizhong Wang
Akari Asai
Gabriel Ilharco
Hannaneh Hajishirzi
Jonathan Berant
dcterms:description: This dataset comprises multimodal questions from various modalities, manually annotated, including images, text, and tables. The questions are generated from templates, with 16 question types and 13 requiring cross-modal retrieval and inference.
dcterms:title: MultimodalQA
